title: Man dies from gunshot wound in Mountain View; one arrested
content:
MOUNTAIN VIEW, Mo. -- A man is dead after a shooting in Mountain View, Missouri.
Police say Chet Hockman, of Mountain View, died from a gunshot wound to the chest at a home. Emergency workers could not revive him.
Police believe the shooting was accidental. Police say a man ran to the police station saying his friend had been shot. Officers arrested him. Police also interviewed a witness at the scene.
